metadata.Title: CVE-2017-14520 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
In Poppler 0.59.0, a floating point exception occurs in Splash::scaleImageYuXd() in Splash.cc, which may lead to a potential attack when handling malicious PDF files.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-14520` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-poppler-0.18 - 0.41.0-0ubuntu1.4
libpoppler-cpp0 - 0.41.0-0ubuntu1.4
libpoppler-glib8 - 0.41.0-0ubuntu1.4
libpoppler-qt4-4 - 0.41.0-0ubuntu1.4
libpoppler-qt5-1 - 0.41.0-0ubuntu1.4
libpoppler58 - 0.41.0-0ubuntu1.4
poppler-utils - 0.41.0-0ubuntu1.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: poppler package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.41.0-0ubuntu1.4').
